ingredients.item: 155g pack fresh Waitrose Garden Peas (or 150g frozen)
75g essential Waitrose Greek Light Salad Cheese, crumbled

instructions.step: Cook the pasta in boiling water for 11 minutes or until tender, then drain and return to the pan.

Meanwhile, boil the peas for 2-3 minutes and drain. Place half the peas in a small food processor with the mint and lemon juice, and purée. Stir into the pasta with the remaining whole peas and cheese, and season to taste.
